last_episode_to_air.name: Gold, Frankincense, and Lead
last_episode_to_air.overview: After hitting rock bottom, Coral and Moisés swim toward the surface. Romeo confesses his sins — but his former employees aren't in a forgiving mood.

name: Sky Rojo
overview: On the run from their pimp and his henchmen, three women embark on a wild and crazy journey in search of freedom.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A fatal turn of events at a brothel sends three women haunted by their pasts on a wild run from their pimp and his henchmen.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Desperate for freedom but tempted by vengeance, Coral, Wendy and Gina continue to face off against their pursuers, who begin to turn on each other.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Coral, Gina and Wendy have made a new life — and found love — in Almería. But with Romeo bent on revenge, their peace and quiet won't last long.

episodes.name: Red Leatherette Sofa
episodes.overview: When Gina gets in a violent brawl with her pimp, Coral and Wendy come to her rescue, sparking an astonishing chain of events.

episodes.name: Alternate Reality
episodes.overview: The trio hides out in a place that seems perfect — until it suddenly isn't. Coral gets shocking news. Romeo's men follow Coral's cellphone signal.

episodes.name: A Whore's Love
episodes.overview: Coral recalls past events that led to an unexpected affair. Gina confesses to being in a relationship with a man, whom she seeks out.

episodes.name: Sex and Blood
episodes.overview: When Moisés and Christian catch up to the trio and corner them, Coral decides to turn the tables on the brothers. Wendy's backstory is revealed.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.overview: Christian and Moisés follow Wendy into a warehouse, where a surprise awaits. Coral admits she came to the club voluntarily, and explains why.

episodes.name: Foxy and Hare
episodes.overview: The trio make a discovery that complicates their plans to escape for good. In a flashback, Romeo asks Coral to work for him in another capacity.

episodes.name: Thinking with your D**k
episodes.overview: The three women seek the vet's help again. Coral opens up about her past. Romeo returns to the club, where Fernando asks to speak to him.

episodes.name: Bear Trap
episodes.overview: Wendy runs into a man who won't take no for an answer. Romeo demands that Moisés prove his loyalty. The trio launch a plan to reclaim what's theirs.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A fatal turn of events at a brothel sends three women haunted by their pasts on a wild run from their pimp and his henchmen.

episodes.name: Hookers Didn't Kiss on the Lips
episodes.overview: An injured Wendy contemplates seeking revenge on Christian as he desperately searches for Moisés. Coral makes a life or death decision regarding Romeo.

episodes.name: The Talent of Wretches
episodes.overview: Gina and Wendy negotiate a hostage swap to get Coral back but their escape brings a new set of challenges.

episodes.name: Fear Weighs 10,000 Tons
episodes.overview: Coral frantically attempts to save herself and her two friends, who fear it is hopeless. Grief seeps into Moisés and Romeo's celebration at the club.

episodes.name: The Night We Were Dead
episodes.overview: Moisés seeks advice from a friend when his guilt threatens to overwhelm him. Underground, Wendy asks Coral for a favor.

episodes.name: Hookers' Black Boxes
episodes.overview: Coral proposes a new plan to get revenge on Romeo. Wendy has an idea of who can help them. Moisés and Christian struggle with their latest obstacle.

episodes.name: Lobster for Death Row Inmates
episodes.overview: Gina finds a creative solution for their weapons problem while Wendy confronts Fermín about his actions. Romeo reminds Christian of their history.

episodes.name: Rotten and Radiant
episodes.overview: After a violent episode at the hotel, the women and Fermín put their robbery plan in motion. Moisés and Christian try to pull off a heist of their own.

episodes.name: Toxic People
episodes.overview: The battle for money, justice and vengeance rages on, straining all parties involved as alliances shift and the victim count rises.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Desperate for freedom but tempted by vengeance, Coral, Wendy and Gina continue to face off against their pursuers, who begin to turn on each other.

episodes.name: Getting into Heaven through the Back Door
episodes.overview: After opening a bakery to launder their stolen millions, Coral, Gina and Wendy are finally beginning to relax. But is this new life too good to last?

episodes.name: The Line That Separates Us
episodes.overview: Unaware that Moisés is heading their way with Romeo's deadly new hire, Darwin, the women host a dinner party that leads Coral to a painful realization.

episodes.name: The Lucky Cat
episodes.overview: Gina reflects on her past and her baby's future. Darwin and Moisés devise a plan to get eyes on their targets, leading to an unfortunate casualty.

episodes.name: Diesel, Saltpeter, and Gunpowder
episodes.overview: Toni takes the ladies out on his boat for their first ocean diving trip, giving Romeo and his crew of assassins a dangerous opportunity.

episodes.name: Jesus Was Right
episodes.overview: Determined to save her baby's life, Gina asks Greta for help. Coral and Wendy try to process the shock of their old life catching up with them.

episodes.name: Ambushing the Embryo
episodes.overview: Wendy proposes a new plan to guarantee her and Coral's freedom. Greta makes a life-changing decision. Moisés finally faces the truth about Romeo.

episodes.name: Helplessness and Ice Hockey
episodes.overview: Coral turns to an unexpected ally to help her get through withdrawal, while Wendy and Greta try to stay one step ahead of their pursuers on the road.

episodes.name: Gold, Frankincense, and Lead
episodes.overview: After hitting rock bottom, Coral and Moisés swim toward the surface. Romeo confesses his sins — but his former employees aren't in a forgiving mood.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Coral, Gina and Wendy have made a new life — and found love — in Almería. But with Romeo bent on revenge, their peace and quiet won't last long.
